content:
melissa NielsenFebruary  

Dont call them chicken the staff at the Taylor Hall was willing to try something new PERIOD



At  a.m PERIOD Wednesday Taylor Dining Service will welcome Tyson Sunset Strips a new line of chicken products with a ribbon cutting ceremony PERIOD

Sheila Epperson assistant director of student housing said the ribbon will be cut on the Taylor side of the cafeteria entrance at  a.m PERIOD on Wednesday by either Mark Hudson director of university housing and dining or Jody Horn director of residence hall food service PERIOD

From here on out the cafeteria will only serve Tyson chicken products PERIOD

Tyson representatives will be at the grand opening to pass out free samples of chick ribs and different types of chicken strips after the ribbon cutting to allow students into the cafeteria PERIOD Free giveaways such as mugs mug huggies and squeezy chicken toys will also be passed out by representatives PERIOD

Its all for the students Epperson said PERIOD We want students to know about our new strips and have a lot of fun at this event. students can also top of their free chicken samples with a special dessert PERIOD Epperson said the cooks at Taylor Hall baked a huge marbled cake decorated with a chicken and the words Welcome Sunset Strips to celebrate the occasion PERIOD

The free samples will continue until all  cases   pounds of chicken  are finished but Epperson said she hopes they will be able to provide free chicken samples until  p.m PERIOD when Taylors lunch service closes PERIOD

We are really excited about this and tried to make this a big deal she said PERIOD

The quality of the new Sunset strips which include Tysons Home Style Pepper Steak House Strips and Peppered Strips are of much higher quality than some of the chicken strips served by Taylor dining hall in the past Epperson said PERIOD

In addition to better quality she said that students will also benefit from Eastern using only Tyson chicken PERIOD

She said that before the university bought from one prime food vendor many students would like a certain type of chicken one week but the university could not constantly serve the same preferred brand PERIOD

Easterns new contract with a single food vendor should make food selection more uniform PERIOD Horn said the new Tyson chicken selection is part of Easterns prime vendor contract with Allen Foods PERIOD

When the university sent out proposals for prime vendors they asked for name brand products and Allen Foods agreed to provide the cafeteria with Tyson chicken PERIOD

We were happy to get Tyson because we know them as a leader in chicken products she said PERIOD It is a quality name brand and people are familiar with it. tyson has always been popular with students Epperson said adding that now students will have a better idea of what chicken products they like and dislike PERIOD

We know now what we are getting and we know we are getting good quality she said PERIOD

Melissa NielsenFebruary  

Faculty Senate will again review discussions held at the Spring  Faculty Forum to formulate recommendations about faculty development PERIOD
